transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji sir, Shubham baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se. Good morning, sir.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Bhej doon sir? 11:30 ka ya 11:20 ka?
Customer: Sir ek 15 se 20 minute pe 11:40 pe de dijiye mereko.
Executive: 11:40 ka abhi main ek kaam karu sir, ek kaam kar raha hu, ruko ek second aapko abhi ruko.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Main aapko 11:45 ka bhej diya. Ek baar aap check kariye aapke paas aa gaya hoga.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Aapki jo mail ID hai, usme maine bhej diya aapko. Ek second main mail ID bata deta hu kaunse wali hai aapki.
Executive: Ek second ruk jao.
Executive: One second sir.
Executive: Yeh wali mail ID hai sir aapki.
Customer: Aa gaya aa gaya sir.
Executive: Chetan, ji Chetan Industries nine at the rate. 11:45 ka hai sir, please join kar lijiyega 11:45 pe. Main join karke available rahunga 11:45 pe.
Customer: Okay okay okay.
Executive: Okay. Theek hai ji. Theek hai sir. Thank you.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Requested a meeting link for 11:40.


Resolution:

- Sent a meeting link for 11:45 via email.
- Confirmed the customer received the link.
- Advised to join the meeting at 11:45.


Next Steps: 
Issue resolved. Customer to join the scheduled meeting at 11:45.

Alert (If Any):
None

@@@Sentiment:
- Neutral -> Neutral | Non-urgent


@@@Key Topics:
- meeting link, scheduling, email confirmation
